item.title: 腾讯在进军中国 K-Pop 音乐市场前增加韩国音乐曝光率
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司正在抢购 SM Entertainment Co.Ltd价值约1.8亿美元的股份，这是近年来中国对韩国公司的罕见投资。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is snapping up a nearly 10% stake in SM Entertainment Co. Ltd valued at about $180 million, marking a rare Chinese investment into a South Korean company in recent years.】

item.title: 上市在即，印度顶级交易所估值飙升 60
item.description: 据参与近期交易的人士称，全球最大的股票衍生品交易所上市的希望越来越大，这使得印度国家证券交易所有限公司在私募市场上的估值达到 580 亿美元。【原文：Growing hopes for a listing of the world’s biggest equity-derivatives bourse have pushed the valuation of the National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. to $58 billion in private markets, according to people involved in recent transactions.】

item.title: 小米第一季度销售额超预期，得益于电动汽车和手机的增长
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）公布的三季度营收好于预期，该公司正积极拓展在中国电动车市场的业务，并发展其核心智能手机业务。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. reported better-than-expected revenue in the March quarter as it moves to aggressively expand its presence in China’s EV market and grow its core smartphone business.】

item.title: 美国企业继续推进资本扩张计划为股市带来动力
item.description: 华尔街担心贸易战的焦虑会使企业在机械和房地产方面的支出停滞不前，但到目前为止，这种担心似乎有些言过其实。【原文：Wall Street’s fear that trade-war anxiety would grind corporations’ spending on machinery and real estate to a halt, so far, is looking a little overblown.】

item.title: 中国就 "零里程 "二手车问题传唤顶级汽车制造商
item.description: 中国商务部正在与中国最大的几家汽车制造商会面，讨论该行业是否在利用漏洞掩盖销售疲软。【原文：China’s Ministry of Commerce is meeting with some of the country’s biggest automakers to discuss whether the industry is using a loophole to mask weakening sales.】

item.title: 默茨称基辅盟国数月前就已终止对俄罗斯罢工的限制
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）说，乌克兰的盟国几个月前决定放弃对使用他们提供的武器的限制，允许基辅打击俄罗斯纵深地区的目标。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said Ukraine’s allies decided several months ago to drop restrictions on the use of the weapons they’ve provided to allow Kyiv to strike targets deep inside Russia.】

item.title: 经典投资策略再次面临压力
item.description:
60/40股票和债券投资组合最近陷入困境

The 60/40 stock and bond portfolio has struggled lately

item.title: 泰尔基金牵头向保加利亚太空公司投资 4900 万美元
item.description: 彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）的创始人基金（Founders Fund）将对保加利亚卫星制造商 EnduroSat 公司投资 4300 万欧元（4900 万美元），以增加其太空投资组合。【原文：Peter Thiel’s Founders Fund is adding to its space portfolio by leading a €43 million ($49 million) investment in EnduroSat, a Bulgarian manufacturer of satellites.】

item.title: 泰国通过退出美国知识产权观察名单计划
item.description: 泰国内阁批准了一项新的知识产权执法框架，因为这个东南亚国家希望在与华盛顿进行关税谈判之前退出美国的观察名单。【原文：Thailand’s cabinet approved a new framework for enforcement of intellectual property rights as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to exit from a US watchlist ahead of tariff talks with Washington.】

item.title: 手握 7 万亿美元现金的投资者翘首以待英伟达财报
item.description: 据 BBVA 的策略师称，Nvidia 公司乐观的财报将是美国股市反弹的好兆头，因为投资者有大约 7 万亿美元的现金基金。【原文：An upbeat earnings report by Nvidia Corp. would bode well for a rally in US equities as investors have about $7 trillion parked in cash funds, according to BBVA strategists.】

item.title: 卡什卡利赞成在关税进一步明朗之前维持美联储利率不变
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）在贸易战带来的不确定性和捍卫通胀预期的 "最重要 "需求面前，加倍强调要保持谨慎。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari doubled down on his case for caution amid uncertainty caused by the trade war and the “paramount” need to defend inflation expectations.】

item.title: 中东自关税动荡以来的首次公开募股首秀波澜不惊
item.description: 沙特包装制造商联合纸箱工业公司（United Carton Industries Co.【原文：Saudi packaging manufacturer United Carton Industries Co.’s stock climbed amid a mixed debut in Riyadh, a sign that broader market turbulence may be impacting Middle Eastern listings.】

item.title: 欧洲电力公司匆忙应对风电干旱问题
item.description: 过去十年间，欧洲斥资约 3800 亿美元将风力发电能力提高了近一倍，现在，公用事业公司正转向一个鲜为人知的不起眼市场，以保护自己免受长期风平浪静天气的影响。【原文：After spending about $380 billion over the past decade to nearly double wind power capacity in Europe, utilities are now turning to an obscure and little-known market to protect themselves against a prolonged bout of calm weather.】

item.title: 欧盟制裁液化天然气油轮，三井OSK寻求日本帮助
item.description: 在欧盟出人意料地决定制裁三井OSK轮船公司三艘与俄罗斯项目有关的液化天然气油轮之后，三井OSK轮船公司正在向日本政府寻求帮助。【原文：Mitsui OSK Lines Ltd. is seeking help from the Japanese government after a surprise decision by the European Union to sanction three of its liquefied natural gas tankers linked to a Russian project.】

item.title: 法国通胀因能源问题降至 2020 年以来最低水平
item.description: 法国的通货膨胀率进一步低于欧洲中央银行设定的 2% 的目标，创下四年多来的新低，这也为进一步削减借贷成本提供了依据。【原文：France’s inflation rate dropped further below the European Central Bank’s 2% target, reaching a more than four-year low and adding to arguments that borrowing costs can be cut further.】

item.title: 随着加密货币规则的出现，Blockchain.com 寻求非洲扩张
item.description: Blockchain.com 是一家总部位于英国的加密货币交易所，它正寻求在非洲国家拓展业务，这些国家已开始制定监管该行业的规则。【原文：Blockchain.com, a UK-based crypto exchange, is seeking to expand in African nations that have started to institute rules to regulate the industry.】

item.title: 印尼煤炭买家称当地指数扭曲了价格
item.description: 一群负责处理印尼十分之一以上动力煤出口的能源贸易商呼吁更换当地指数，他们认为该指数将价格推高到了实际市场水平之上。【原文：A group of energy traders handling more than a 10th of Indonesia’s thermal coal exports are calling for the replacement of a local index that they say is pushing prices above actual market levels.】

item.title: 印度煤炭公司将通过咨询公司首次公开募股将首个部门上市
item.description: 印度煤炭有限公司（Coal India Ltd.）将通过首次公开募股出售其在采矿咨询单位中央矿山规划设计院有限公司（CMPDI）所持股份的 10%。(CMPDI) 首次公开发行股票。【原文：Coal India Ltd. will sell as much as 10% of its holding in mining consultancy unit Central Mine Planning & Design Institute Ltd. (CMPDI) through an initial public offering.】

item.title: 马来西亚为中国提供棕榈油，挑起 "火锅外交
item.description: 麻辣火锅是一种流行的麻辣菜肴，在煨锅中加入生肉和蔬菜烹制而成。【原文：Malaysia is seeking to expand its palm oil market in China by offering a plant-based alternative for use in mala hotpot, a popular spicy dish that’s cooked with raw meats and vegetables in a simmering pot.】

item.title: 日本政府小组就收益率上升对财政的影响发出警告
item.description: 日本政府的一个顾问小组敦促政府当局加大财政整顿力度，因为日本央行持续的货币紧缩政策增加了世界上负债最多的发达国家偿债成本上升的风险。【原文：A Japanese government advisory panel urged authorities to step up fiscal consolidation efforts, as the Bank of Japan’s ongoing monetary tightening efforts raise the risk of higher debt-servicing costs for the world’s most indebted developed nation.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税首月瑞士对美出口骤降
item.description: 4 月份，瑞士对美国的出口大幅下降，显示出唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的影响。【原文：Swiss exports to the US plummeted in April, showing the fallout from President Donald Trump’s tariff policy.】

item.title: 财政部消息提振市场情绪，国债与日债齐涨
item.description: 日本债券市场的反弹已蔓延到美国国债，因为有迹象表明，日本当局可能会在经历一段动荡时期后寻求重建稳定，这刺激了全球市场的债券购买热潮。【原文：A rally in Japan’s bond market has spilled over to US Treasuries, as signs that Japanese authorities may look to re-establish stability after a tumultuous period fuel a spate of bond buying across global markets.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数因贸易乐观情绪而反弹
汇丰银行在投资银行业务改革中裁减数十个分析师职位
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着欧洲最大的银行深化投资银行业务重组，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）最近几天已裁减了二十多名分析师。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has culled more than two dozen analysts in recent days as Europe’s largest lender deepens a restructuring of its investment banking businesses, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本从储备中拨款 27 亿美元缓解美国关税冲击
item.description: 日本政府批准了一项从储备基金中提取 3880 亿日元（27 亿美元）以支持受美国关税影响的企业和家庭的计划，这项紧急措施旨在缓解唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面贸易运动在国内造成的影响。【原文：Japan’s government approved a plan to draw ¥388 billion ($2.7 billion) from reserve funds to support businesses and households impacted by US tariffs, in an emergency measure aimed at easing the domestic repercussions of President Donald Trump’s sweeping trade campaign.】

item.title: 小麦带旱情缓解，中国南方迎来暴雨
item.description: 继上周的暴雨为中国北部的小麦种植农户解了燃眉之急之后，中国南部正准备迎接一场大雨，这场大雨将为一些干旱的农业地区补充土壤水分。【原文：Southern China is bracing for heavy rain that’s set to replenish soil moisture in some parched agricultural regions, following storms last week that provided relief for wheat farmers in the north of the country.】

item.title: 世界银行称肯尼亚经济增长将因债务和财政压力而放缓
item.description: 世界银行表示，在公共财政紧张和债务高企的不利因素影响下，肯尼亚的经济增速预计将连续第二年放缓。【原文：Kenya’s economic growth rate is expected to slow for the second straight year amid headwinds from tight public finances and high debt levels, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 据说日本财务省将就债券销售问题向市场发声
item.description: 几位熟悉内情的人士称，日本财务省已就政府债券的适当发行量向市场参与者发出了一份调查问卷。【原文：Japan’s finance ministry has sent a questionnaire to market participants regarding appropriate issuance amounts for government bonds, several people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 匈牙利将维持利率不变，关注价格风险：决策指南
item.description: 匈牙利央行可能将维持利率不变，因为即使政府发出经济增长前景恶化的信号，决策者仍将重点关注抑制通胀风险。【原文：Hungary’s central bank will probably keep interest rates unchanged as policymakers focus on curbing inflation risks even as the government signals a worsening outlook for growth.】

item.title: 交易商对需求前景保持谨慎，铁矿石回调
item.description: 铁矿石连跌第四天，原因是交易商对需求保持谨慎，并评估了限制中国钢铁行业产能过剩的举措。【原文：Iron ore extended its losing streak for a fourth day as traders remained cautious about demand and assessed moves to limit overcapacity in China’s steel sector.】
